text: @RandPaul You mean the RPaul that  voted against the #coronavirus relief package? The one that voted against sick paid leave? The one getting the best care off of our hard earned tax dollars? Great benefits&sick leave.  That guy?I don’t wish this on anyone but karma never loses an address
